name: Abillionveg, Inc
description: Developer of a global review and discovery platform designed to voice an opinion about anything plant-based or cruelty-free. The company's platform leverages technology to help find where to eat, plant-based recipes, perspectives and tips on living well, and also share feedback with business owners to help them shift to more plant-based options, enabling customers to voice their opinions on plant-based alternatives.
one_liner: Developer of a global review and discovery platform designed to voice an opinion about anything plant-based or cruelty-free. The company's platform leverages technology to help find where to eat, plant-based recipes, perspectives and tips on living well, and also share feedback with business owners to help them shift to more plant-based options, enabling customers to voice their opinions on plant-based alternatives.

name: AVIONETA Global LLC
description: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.
one_liner: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.
industry: App, Health Tech, Impact, Subscription, Wellness, Healthcare, Social Impact

name: Chaart, Inc.
description: Operator of an art asset management platform intended for collecting art in a smarter way. The company's platform manages art including original paintings, prints, art toys, posters, and goods, and tracks the value of the collection, enabling users to discover art trends through collectors' authentic collections.
one_liner: Operator of an art asset management platform intended for collecting art in a smarter way. The company's platform manages art including original paintings, prints, art toys, posters, and goods, and tracks the value of the collection, enabling users to discover art trends through collectors' authentic collections.

name: HELP Inc.
description: Venturz is an all-in-one startup platform for entrepreneurs to launch, grow and manage their ventures in one place — from creating landing pages and running marketing campaigns to managing customers and raising funds, Venturz allows founders to build their businesses seamlessly under one roof.
one_liner: Venturz is an all-in-one startup platform for entrepreneurs to launch, grow and manage their ventures in one place — from creating landing pages and running marketing campaigns to managing customers and raising funds, Venturz allows founders to build their businesses seamlessly under one roof.

name: IMAN Group Ltd.
description: Operator of a financial technology platform intended for investors, merchants, and shoppers. The company's platform offers users a mobile application with investment and cash management services, credit payment services, and an online shopping platform, enabling users to invest and get funding ethically and in line with religious views and faith.
one_liner: Operator of a financial technology platform intended for investors, merchants, and shoppers. The company's platform offers users a mobile application with investment and cash management services, credit payment services, and an online shopping platform, enabling users to invest and get funding ethically and in line with religious views and faith.

name: Playbite Inc.
description: Developer of a gaming platform designed to earn tickets while playing. The company's application allows gamers to redeem their earned ticket for prize money, enabling users to play fun games and earn real prizes.
one_liner: Developer of a gaming platform designed to earn tickets while playing. The company's application allows gamers to redeem their earned ticket for prize money, enabling users to play fun games and earn real prizes.

name: RapChat, LLC.
description: Developer of a music-making platform designed to help artists record and share songs from the phone. The company's platform provides users with access to a social network of audience and artists that help drive connectivity and collaboration via its mobile recording studio that features various music-making tools, enabling artists to make content and deliver it directly to their audience with ease.
one_liner: Developer of a music-making platform designed to help artists record and share songs from the phone. The company's platform provides users with access to a social network of audience and artists that help drive connectivity and collaboration via its mobile recording studio that features various music-making tools, enabling artists to make content and deliver it directly to their audience with ease.

name: Sanad Cash, Inc.
description: Developer of an all-in-one spending management platform intended to track all spending from one single dashboard. The company's platform tracks all business transactions with instant corporate card issuing to control spending and instantly issue multi-currencies corporate cards for employees, enabling startups, small and medium enterprises and corporates to reduce fraud and save time collecting expense receipts.
one_liner: Developer of an all-in-one spending management platform intended to track all spending from one single dashboard. The company's platform tracks all business transactions with instant corporate card issuing to control spending and instantly issue multi-currencies corporate cards for employees, enabling startups, small and medium enterprises and corporates to reduce fraud and save time collecting expense receipts.

name: ShearShare, Inc.
description: Developer of a business-to-business mobile platform designed to increase empty salon chairs on demand. The company's platform matches salon and barbershop owners with licensed beauty professionals, enabling stylists to find and book working spaces for rent.
one_liner: Developer of a business-to-business mobile platform designed to increase empty salon chairs on demand. The company's platform matches salon and barbershop owners with licensed beauty professionals, enabling stylists to find and book working spaces for rent.

name: Sleek EV Pte Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of electric scooters designed for urban riding and create a world where green vehicles become the new standard. The company's scooters utilize motors with field-oriented control, ensuring power optimization and maximum acceleration and removable batteries that can be charged in-bike or via sockets, enabling users to travel efficiently and sustainably.
one_liner: Manufacturer of electric scooters designed for urban riding and create a world where green vehicles become the new standard. The company's scooters utilize motors with field-oriented control, ensuring power optimization and maximum acceleration and removable batteries that can be charged in-bike or via sockets, enabling users to travel efficiently and sustainably.

name: Ibtikar Technologies SPV Ltd
description: Developer of a tech talent platform designed to build teams with remote talents. The company's platform focus on services such as vetting, hiring engineers and payroll services plus the option of a product manager per squad, enabling companies to hire the right person for the right job and manage their team efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of a tech talent platform designed to build teams with remote talents. The company's platform focus on services such as vetting, hiring engineers and payroll services plus the option of a product manager per squad, enabling companies to hire the right person for the right job and manage their team efficiently.

name: DMKTZ Inc.
description: Provider and developer of digitization designed for fashion industry. The company provides body and fabric digitization using 3D technology, enabling clients with design, manufacturing and innovative online shopping experience.
one_liner: Provider and developer of digitization designed for fashion industry. The company provides body and fabric digitization using 3D technology, enabling clients with design, manufacturing and innovative online shopping experience.

name: Yanzo Limited
description: Developer of a text-based personal assistant platform designed to help consumers shop and run their day-to-day errands. The company's platform offers services including shopping, electronics, cleaning, event management, gifting services, floral services, logistics, travel services, home furnishing, and others, enabling users to outsource low-priority activities.
one_liner: Developer of a text-based personal assistant platform designed to help consumers shop and run their day-to-day errands. The company's platform offers services including shopping, electronics, cleaning, event management, gifting services, floral services, logistics, travel services, home furnishing, and others, enabling users to outsource low-priority activities.
